attributes.additional_details: Animals need to stop being treated so cruelly , like humans they have feelings and feel pain too . No one would appreciate if hunters went round capturing humans and using them for skin or food , so why should they do it to animals ? Its not nice seeing pictures of abused animals on the internet , its a revolting sight to see and shouldnt even be put up , on top of getting abused its almost embarassing for animals being exploited on the net.  One day animal cruelty needs to stop and animals to be treated the way they deserve
